attributes.name: Online Store
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive Online Store application in the Boxel framework that provides a complete e-commerce platform for businesses to sell products online. This app should integrate product management, shopping cart functionality, checkout processes, order management, and customer accounts into a unified selling experience.

## Core Components

### Storefront Features
- **Homepage Builder**: Drag-and-drop homepage customization with hero banners, featured products, collections
- **Product Catalog Browser**: Category navigation, filters, search, sorting, grid/list views
- **Product Detail Pages**: Image galleries, variant selection, reviews, related products
- **Shopping Cart**: Persistent cart, quantity updates, price calculations, shipping estimates
- **Checkout Flow**: Multi-step or single-page checkout, guest checkout option
- **Customer Accounts**: Registration, login, order history, wishlists, addresses

### Store Management
- **Product Management**: Bulk import/export, quick edit, inventory tracking
- **Order Processing**: Order queue, status updates, fulfillment workflow
- **Customer Management**: Customer profiles, purchase history, communication
- **Inventory Control**: Stock levels, low stock alerts, automatic reordering
- **Promotion Engine**: Discounts, coupons, sales, bundle deals

### Sales Channels
- **Web Storefront**: Responsive design for desktop/mobile
- **Mobile App**: Native mobile shopping experience
- **Social Commerce**: Facebook Shop, Instagram Shopping integration
- **Marketplace Integration**: Amazon, eBay, Etsy connections
- **B2B Portal**: Wholesale pricing, bulk ordering, net terms

### Payment & Checkout
- **Payment Methods**: Credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, cryptocurrencies
- **Checkout Options**: Express checkout, saved payment methods
- **Tax Calculation**: Automatic tax rates by location
- **Shipping Integration**: Real-time rates, label printing
- **Order Confirmation**: Email receipts, order tracking

## Technical Architecture

### Frontend Components
- **Store Theme Engine**: Customizable themes with live preview
- **Product Search**: Elasticsearch-powered search with filters
- **Cart API**: REST/GraphQL API for cart operations
- **Checkout SDK**: Secure payment form components
- **Customer Portal**: Self-service account management

### Backend Services
- **Product Service**: CRUD operations, variant management
- **Order Service**: Order creation, status management
- **Inventory Service**: Real-time stock tracking
- **Payment Service**: Payment gateway integration
- **Shipping Service**: Carrier API connections
- **Email Service**: Transactional email delivery

### Data Models
- **Products**: Hierarchical categories, variants, attributes
- **Orders**: Line items, shipping, payments, fulfillment
- **Customers**: Profiles, addresses, payment methods
- **Inventory**: Stock levels, reservations, movements
- **Promotions**: Rules engine for complex discounts

## User Interfaces

### Customer-Facing UI
- **Homepage**: Dynamic content blocks, featured products, announcements
- **Category Pages**: Product grid with filters sidebar
- **Product Pages**: Image zoom, variant selector, add to cart
- **Cart Drawer**: Slide-out cart with quick checkout
- **Checkout Pages**: Address, shipping, payment forms
- **Account Dashboard**: Orders, addresses, wishlist management

### Admin Dashboard
- **Sales Overview**: Revenue charts, conversion metrics
- **Order Management**: Filterable order list with bulk actions
- **Product Editor**: Rich text description, media upload
- **Customer Insights**: Purchase patterns, lifetime value
- **Marketing Tools**: Email campaigns, discount creation
- **Reports & Analytics**: Sales reports, inventory reports

### Mobile App Screens
- **App Homepage**: Personalized recommendations
- **Product Browser**: Swipeable product cards
- **Quick Shop**: One-tap purchasing
- **Order Tracking**: Push notifications for updates
- **Barcode Scanner**: Product lookup by scanning

## Integration Requirements

### Payment Gateways
- Stripe, PayPal, Square, Authorize.net
- PCI compliance for card processing
- Webhook handling for payment events
- Refund and partial refund support

### Shipping Carriers
- USPS, UPS, FedEx, DHL integration
- Real-time rate calculation
- Label generation and printing
- Tracking number sync

### Marketing Tools
- Email marketing platforms (Mailchimp, Klaviyo)
- SMS marketing services
- Loyalty program systems
- Affiliate tracking

### Analytics & Reporting
- Google Analytics e-commerce tracking
- Facebook Pixel for retargeting
- Custom event tracking
- A/B testing framework

## Advanced Features

### Personalization
- Product recommendations based on browsing history
- Personalized email campaigns
- Dynamic pricing for customer segments
- Abandoned cart recovery

### Multi-Channel Selling
- Centralized inventory across channels
- Order aggregation from all sources
- Consistent pricing and promotions
- Channel-specific settings

### International Commerce
- Multi-currency support with conversion
- Multi-language storefronts
- International shipping options
- Localized payment methods

### B2B Features
- Customer-specific pricing
- Quote generation
- Net payment terms
- Bulk ordering interfaces
- Sales rep assignments

## Performance Requirements
- Page load times under 3 seconds
- Support for 10,000+ products
- Handle 1,000+ concurrent users
- 99.9% uptime SLA
- Real-time inventory updates
- Scalable infrastructure

## Security Considerations
- PCI DSS compliance for payments
- SSL certificates for all pages
- Secure customer data storage
- Regular security audits
- Fraud detection and prevention
- GDPR compliance tools

## Mobile Optimization
- Progressive Web App capabilities
- Touch-optimized interfaces
- Mobile-specific checkout flow
- Offline browsing support
- App store deployment

## Business Logic
- Dynamic pricing rules
- Inventory allocation logic
- Tax exemption handling
- Shipping zone configuration
- Return/refund workflows
- Subscription billing support
- Wholesale tier pricing
- Product bundle logic
